text:
Rainforest QA (YC S12) | Devops, Front end engineer, Senior data scientist (generalist) | SF / Singapore / US/International Remote

Well run distributed team of great folks. We're fixing QA, which turns out has a lot of things to fix. It's super interesting and varied. We're mostly using Ruby, Go, Elixir, Crystal, React, Postgres...things are well tested.

Also hiring various other roles; csm, marketing, product. More details about the company and the team here - https://www.rainforestqa.com/careers/
